name: Hawaiian Chicky for the Crockpot
ingredientLines: 3 chicken breasts (I get the flash frozen ones so I can only cook what I need)
1 cup diced pineapple (for a more thick sauce, drain the fruit, but I usually use the juice becauce it really adds a sweet )
2 cups frozen sliced red and green peppers (Again, I get the frozen bags and use only the amount needed BUT fresh is fine too)
1/2 cup frozen chopped onion, however fresh is fine
2 cups of smokey style honey barbecue sauce
